Package mcp.mobius.waila.api

Interface IServerDataProvider<T>

All Superinterfaces:
IDataProvider<T>
@Deprecated(forRemoval=true) @ScheduledForRemoval(inVersion="1.21") @ServerOnly @OverrideOnly public interface IServerDataProvider<T> extends IDataProvider<T>
Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
use IDataProvider instead.

    • appendData

      default void appendData(IDataWriter data, IServerAccessor<T> accessor, IPluginConfig config)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Description copied from interface: IDataProvider
      Callback used server side to return a custom synchronization CompoundTag.

      Will only be called if the implementing class is registered via IRegistrar.addBlockData(mcp.mobius.waila.api.IDataProvider<BE>, java.lang.Class<T>, int) or IRegistrar.addEntityData(mcp.mobius.waila.api.IDataProvider<E>, java.lang.Class<T>, int).

      Specified by:
      appendData in interface IDataProvider<T>
      Parameters:
      data - current synchronization data (might have been processed by other providers and might be processed by other providers)
      accessor - contains the relevant context of the environment
      config - current plugin configurations, values could be different from the requesting client unless it was registered via IRegistrar.addSyncedConfig(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation, boolean, boolean)
